Ander name: Bipolar affective disorder (BPAD), Bipolar illness, manic depression, manic depressive disorder, manic- depressione illness, manic- depressione psychosis, circular insanity, bipolar disease
Symptome: Periodes van depressie en verhoogde stemming
Tipes: Bipolar I stoornis, bipolar II stoornis, ander
Risk faktors: Familie geskiedenis, jeugd misbruik, Langtermijn stress
Differentiaal diagnose: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, personality disorders, schizophrenia, substance use disorder
